EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Steven (1323898772.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Steven (1323898772.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Steven,
Thanks for the kind note on the website, our marketing department will be happy to hear - and glad we caught you at the right time. Please feel free to just book a time using my online scheduler by going here. Feel free to share this scheduler with anyone who may be interested in chatting with me.
Look forward to speaking with you.
Regards,
Steve
From: Steven Page [mailto:spage7@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 4:16 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Steven
Thank you so much for contacting me, Steven. Your email is very timely, as I am considering this for the near future. Currently, I am an IT contractor/consultant working with a large government contracting company. Actually, I have worked for several, having been in the IT field for over 20 years.
I see you guys have improved your website a lot. Great info!
I will definitely be setting up a phone call very soon. I just want to go through all your new info and jot down all my questions first. Should I contact you directly, or use the appointment scheduling tool? I also know several others like myself who would be interested in doing the same thing.
Thanks a lot.
Steven Page
From: Steven Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: spage7@yahoo.com Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 11:01 AM Subject: MBO Partners Steven Dear Steven, I wanted to share the news that MBO Partners just released a study that you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Thats not all. We recently re-launched our Web site which includes relevant tools such as a Bill Rate Calculator, a self-assessment tool on independence, and a video that shows how we help independents succeed in todays project economy. We encourage you to take a look. Take a moment to instantly schedule an appointment if youd like to take advantage of my time and interest in the independent professionals unique challenges and needs. Are you currently working in a W2 role and thinking of starting your first contract? Are you already working independently and have a new project commencing? Now is a great time to connect with MBO Partners. As always, were here to make it easier for independent consultants to do business. Steven Arhancet ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Share your story! MBO Partner is profiling independent professionals across the country. Read their stories, or share your own.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe
</body
